DOC.brief_summary: This study will examine the feasibility and acceptability of yoga for adolescents seen by a medical practitioner for their headaches. The study will also examine whether yoga decreases anxiety and improves quality of life. We hypothesize that yoga will be both acceptable and feasible with a pediatric population. We also hypothesize that yoga will decrease anxiety and improve quality of life.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Yoga for the Treatment of Pediatric Headaches
DOC.criteria: 1317 years patient seen in the headache clinic at Children's Hospital of Wisconsin neck, spinal, or back injuries
